data.body: Rice Exchange is a digital blockchain-enabled rice trading platform bringing transparency, liquidity, security and improved access to the $450 billion rice market.

data.title: Fertilizer Exchange is a digital platform that lets buyers, sellers and third parties trade fertilizers quickly and securely.
data.body: Fully integrated with service providers and built on blockchain, it is an online ecosystem for the international fertilizer trade.
DCX Pulses offers an integrated and secure blockchain online ecosystem to help buyers and sellers efficiently trade and deliver pulses, including chickpeas, lentils, beans and more globally.
DCX Grains will launch in Q2 2022, enabling users to trade barley, corn and wheat
DCX Finance is embedded in the platforms to enable finance providers to provide trade finance solutions to users based on trades.
DCX Freight connects buyers and sellers to maritime transport providers and brokers and offers easy access to freight quotes, bookings and contracting in the  dry bulk and container segments.

data.title: DCX Insurance connects buyers and sellers with top insurance providers to manage risk across the supply chain.
data.body: Access competitive quotes directly on the trading platform
